"I think we did a pretty good job so far."

This game is amazing to play, there is so many to do and once in 3 months a new DLC comes out. Maps are playable for everyone, so don't worry about playing with friends, you all have the cool map you want to play.

Altough the game has many points that are amazing, there are also a few bugs. Some bugs is something we don't mind about. But when experiencing an endless match you're pretty annoyed. 

The chance of getting a bug like this is very small, so I would still recommend this game. I'm hoping they're fixing this if possible

玩了500来小时，度过了前期的迷茫，现在可以好好静下心来写一条评测了，游戏不错，但bug确实让人难受，人类屠夫都有玩，但总的来说，还是屠夫会点，毕竟没上过一段的都不敢说自己玩过这个游戏了，在b站发过几个视频，给我的感受就是游戏很小众，播放量少，也可能是我太菜打不出精彩的操作。还有就是有些玩家素质实在堪忧，嘲讽就不说了，还很喜欢问候亲人，至于为啥不提外挂，那是因为没啥好说的，献祭双亲得来的力量总是让某些人欲罢不能，让我不得不离开国服。最后黎明杀机天下第一！！！

Have you always wanted to smack your friends around as a badass killer from some of your favourite horror movies? Well, look no further!

In actuality, you're probably gonna get looped by the survivors, as they T-bag you and make you question your very existence, while clicking their flashlights in the distance, taunting you to switch target from the poor soul you've been chasing for the past 10 minutes without success. Still interested? Oh boy, it only gets better from here.

Have you finally gotten the best perks in the game and you're playing your favourite horror movie killer? Well, that's great! I'm sure you're gonna catch those pesky little survivors in no time!

Uhm, actually... no, you won't. So, you know how the survivors looped you around the map for 10 minutes straight while taunting you with flashlights, dropping all 500 pallets on you that are around each and every corner, all while popping 5 gens in 2 minutes through your Hex: Ruin? Yeah, that all happened in the last paragraph or two. Well, it's great you remember it and I'm sorry for putting your imagination through that horror for a second time. 

With all of that said, you might actually land a hit on the survivors now! Or can you? Of course you can't! They've all got Dead Hard (and no, I'm not talking about your pee pee, you naughty boy), so as soon as you're about to hit that juicy slash, they're gonna pop the bad boy and dash away from you! Oh, what's that? They've got no pallets around and no jungle gyms? Nice! Go get them, big boy! Now that you've finally downed that slippery, environment-blending Claudette, go pick her up and put her on a hook!

Well done! Should I remind you of the other three people running around with flashlights? There's a Dwight T-bagging you to the left, don't pick the Claudette up yet...! Aaaand, it's too late, my dear killer. He's got the flashlight aaaand he's got the save too, what a shame. If only you had Lightborn, then maybe you'd—what's Lightborn? Oh, nevermind, I'll just spare you the suffering for now...

Dead by Daylight is the perfect game for the entire family. Have you got that one cousin who never stops talking about how good he is at everything? Great! Let him play the killer while you and your family members loop him for an eternity as you all laugh together and your cousin slowly loses all his brain cells and sanity. In reality, this game isn't an asymmetrical 1v4 experience, it's actually a 4v1 gang-bang simulator in which a group of friends take on the roles of 4 deadly high-school bullies as they toy around with the killer, slowly driving him mad with all their second-chance perks.

And if you're already dead on the inside, then playing killer in this game might just be your thing! Have fun and please the Entity! Alternatively, join the bullies and make use of all your excess time and energy in a positive way! Someone's gotta make these killers rage-quit, after all! And never forget, my dear friend, always "gg ez" in the chat!

Sincerely,

Ya boi Saber

This game is honestly a steaming pile of garbage with useless and incompetent devs that can't take criticism, a toxic community, an unoptimized broken mess and an unbalanced game. The game at  first looks good if your new, but they specifically made it to be more appealing to newer players other then experienced players, vsync is automatically turned on, so you have to look through the game files and turn it off yourself, plenty of hackers and lag switchers, they said they would release dedicated servers, but it's been delayed so much and we've waited so long, ranking up is broken, matchmaking is absolute garbage, killers are extremely overpowered(nurse,spirit) and with their killer perks, on the other hand survivors have perks that are nerfed to crap, I cannot recommend this game at all, it will give you a run for your money, refund it if you can.

一款恐怖不对称对战游戏，以1v4的游戏规则使游戏具有更加的游玩性，这款游戏对于萌新来说并不是特别友好，一旦你对游戏的规则和游戏方法理解透彻，以及一些技术，那么将不会成为一个恐怖的游戏，叫他欢乐Dead比较好，但在这款游戏中Bug也是比较多的，有时候你会突然因为网络问题被踢出游戏，但是你发现自己的网络没有任何问题，或者你在兴致勃勃的时候打开游戏会提示你无网络连接，你可以认为服务器炸了，但毕竟是款16年的老游戏，Dead by daylight一直被模仿，但从未被超越！

I really wish I could like this game. At times, it is great fun, especially with friends. However, with the recent updates and changes to the game, it is clear that the devs do not care about the game and its community. Recent updates are only related to in-game purchases and other revenue streams for bhvr. A literal brain dead fetus could see that the game is stale and bland. Several characters and perks need reworks and changes. Yet, with how long the game has been out for, nothing has been done to address these issues. It is clear that the devs have absolutely no idea how to fix their game and obviously don't care.

Отвратительная игра, которая создана только для выжимания денег из ДЛС и красивых костюмов. Комьюнити очень токсичное, особенно наши, российские, игроки. Карты однообразны, механика геймплея тоже. В геймплей кроме догонялок и генераторов ничего не добавляют. Огромное количество багов и ошибок с пингом: если вы маньяк и у вас высокий пинг - у вас все шансы на победу, так как выживших трясёт во время игры как при эпилепсии.

It's a fun game. Mechanics of trying to work together and escaping a killer is quite challenging.
 They fixed my problem by going dedicated so now I"m getiing 180 ping, which I'm fine with. Still won't recommend it to friends

Edit: After okaying it a bit more, it's gotten quite a bit more tolerable. I've learned that when you go on solo, always expect your teammates to be braindead. Focus on yourself until you know what you're doing. Once you're confident, then you'll be able to help your teammates and possibly even save them, allowing them to escape with you.

Is it worth trying? I'd say so. There's not much else like it
